entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Parrsboro
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
